name: King of Shadows (Wolfy games)
description:
Why is there no way out?

How did this happen?

Your destiny is predetermined. Look for the letters and follow the king, otherwise you will be severely punished. His missions may be very difficult, but you have no choice but to obey. Make the king happy with fear and despair. But know that there is no way out. What are you going to do? Obedience or disobedience? Everything depends on you because you love freedom. is not it?

Controls

Picking upLeft clickDrop the letterTTurn on the flashlightF

Made by: BlackGem

*If you get stuck in the game guide, press the esc button, then click on "I understand" and then "Continue" to start the game.
